originalText.text: We had a pretty bad experience with our last web design company, not only they didn't do what they promised, but in the end they told us they can't give us any of the files or the codes, because they own it. This was a special themed website for our partners, and it was imperative for us to keep it up to date and have the ability to add content on a regular basis. We applied to Big Drop Inc. The team took time to brainstorm on what could be done. In less than two weeks, our website was up and running and looks amazing. Perfect!

text.text: We had a pretty bad experience with our last web design company, not only they didn't do what they promised, but in the end they told us they can't give us any of the files or the codes, because they own it. This was a special themed website for our partners, and it was imperative for us to keep it up to date and have the ability to add content on a regular basis. We applied to Big Drop Inc. The team took time to brainstorm on what could be done. In less than two weeks, our website was up and running and looks amazing. Perfect!

originalText.text: Big Drop Inc took our website from hacked and dysfunctional state, to online and presentable the following few weeks. They made additional local and cloud backup features that will help us to restore to stable website builds in the future. Guys also added a helpful firewall to our website. Then they initiated site replication snapshots on our web hosting account. It was absolutely amazing, and we feel much better about the security and redundancy of our website. I would recommend this company to my own clients.

originalText.text: Websites shouldn't be a pain and Big Drop Inc revived our belief in a genuine business that cares about our needs and not just our money. I required help with a website that was about to go live that contained a formatting glitch. The team also has been berry responsible with my accounts which is very convenient for my business to have someone that I can trust. They were very efficient, assured me the conversion would be seamless, and again they impressed me by delivering a beautiful, classy, and artistically designed website in a timely manner.

originalText.text: The strategy Big Drop Inc uses is unique. When comparing last year's traffic to this year's traffic we are up over 50 percent and our revenue has increased as well. The previous Google updates hit us really hard because of some major back link issues created by our previous freelancer. They helped us clean up the mess and since then, we have regained a great deal of our traffic. It's been very frustrating having to fix all the problems, but this team moved us forward. Highly recommended if you want things done right from the beginning.

originalText.text: As a business owner, there are so many hats I have to wear in order to ensure things go smoothly, so we needed a professional team to help us with this project, including new website and web dev services. We found Big Drop Inc and I can say these guys is all you and your company need and want. The team knows how to make your website match your imagination. They were able to give us many options to choose from. We appreciated their attention to detail and fast response time, the guys were also available for follow-up questions which was very helpful.
